title: Strinova Tier List
description: Comprehensive ranking of Strinova characters from S to C Tier, detailing their abilities and strategic advantages.
heading: Strinova Tier List
introText: Comprehensive ranking of Strinova characters from S to C Tier, detailing their abilities and strategic advantages.

data.itemDescription: Utilizes assault rifles with exceptional efficiency; her shield regeneration ability is invaluable, and her second Awakening is particularly powerful
Excels in disrupting entrenched enemies with her Plasma Ball ability; gains armor regeneration from her Awakenings, synergizing well with Celestia's skills
Deploys turrets that force enemies to engage, providing opportunities for ambushes and area control; a master of map dominance
Offers healing abilities beneficial across all game modes; her sniper rifle delivers consistent damage, even without headshots
Possesses strong map control utilities and robust weaponry; however, his long cooldowns can be a disadvantage
Features survivability against snipers and a teleportation ability in his third Awakening; requires skill to utilize effectively
Her abilities can disable opponents' Paper mode, making her highly effective in competitive play; may seem less impactful to casual players
Capable of detecting enemies, gaining movement speed, and self-regenerating; her self-resurrection ability adds to her clutch potential, though she demands a high skill level
Offers impressive map control, which becomes more potent after her third Awakening; early-game performance may require strategic sacrifices
Can be formidable against less experienced players; however, higher-level opponents can effectively counter him by managing his cooldowns
Beginner-friendly and excels at holding positions; her stationary nature can be a liability in a game that favors mobility
Offers high rewards for skilled play; her invincibility mechanic requires cautious use, and missing shots can lead to unnecessary deaths
Her mechanics encourage periods of inactivity, which can be detrimental in a fast-paced game; many of her attributes are underutilized
Possesses abilities beneficial for map control; however, she requires Awakenings to be effective, making her early-game performance underwhelming
Offers utility similar to Lawine, with better Awakenings; still, there are superior options available for players seeking a sniper role
